name: poi
summary: Extract points of interest by category
description:
The poi command extracts points of interest from OSM data, organized into logical categories:

- food: restaurants, cafes, bars, fast food
- shop: retail stores of all types
- health: hospitals, clinics, pharmacies
- education: schools, universities, libraries
- transport: bus stops, stations, parking
- tourism: hotels, museums, attractions
- finance: banks, ATMs
- service: post offices, police, fire stations
- worship: churches, mosques, temples, synagogues

options.-c, --category: POI category: food, shop, health, education, transport, tourism, finance, service, worship, all

output:
GeoJSON with properties:
- id: OSM node/way ID
- category: POI category
- type: Specific amenity/shop type
- name: POI name
- address: Full address if available
- phone: Contact phone if tagged
- website: Website URL if tagged
- opening_hours: Hours if tagged
